00040 void PointDomain::snap_to( Mesh::VertexHandle,
00041                            Vector3D &coordinate) const
00042   { coordinate = geom(); }
00043   
00044 void PointDomain::vertex_normal_at( Mesh::VertexHandle ,
00045                                     Vector3D &coordinate) const
00046   { coordinate.set(0,0,0); }
00047 
00048 void PointDomain::element_normal_at( Mesh::ElementHandle ,
00049                                      Vector3D &coordinate) const
00050   { coordinate.set(0,0,0); }
00051               
00052 void PointDomain::vertex_normal_at( const Mesh::VertexHandle* ,
00053                                     Vector3D coordinates[],
00054                                     unsigned count,
00055                                     MsqError& err ) const
00056 { 
00057   std::fill( coordinates, coordinates+count, Vector3D(0,0,0) );
00058   MSQ_SETERR(err)( "Cannot get normal for PointDomain", MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR );
00059 }
00060                 
00061 void PointDomain::closest_point( Mesh::VertexHandle ,
00062                                  const Vector3D& ,
00063                                  Vector3D& closest,
00064                                  Vector3D& normal,
00065                                  MsqError& err ) const
00066 {
00067   closest = geom();
00068   normal.set(0,0,0);
00069   MSQ_SETERR(err)( "Cannot get normal for PointDomain", MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR );
00070 }

00072 void PointDomain::domain_DoF( const Mesh::VertexHandle* ,
00073                               unsigned short* dof_array,
00074                               size_t num_handles,
00075                               MsqError&  ) const
00076   { std::fill( dof_array, dof_array+num_handles, 0 ); }

00078 void LineDomain::snap_to( Mesh::VertexHandle ,
00079                           Vector3D &coordinate) const
00080   { coordinate = geom().point(geom().closest( coordinate )); }

00082 void LineDomain::vertex_normal_at( Mesh::VertexHandle ,
00083                                    Vector3D &coordinate) const
00084     // no normal, return tangent instead.
00085   { coordinate = geom().direction(); }
00086 
00087 void LineDomain::element_normal_at( Mesh::ElementHandle ,
00088                                     Vector3D &coordinate) const
00089     // no normal, return tangent instead.
00090   { coordinate = geom().direction(); }

00093                                    Vector3D coordinates[],
00094                                    unsigned count,
00095                                    MsqError& err ) const
00096 {
00097   std::fill( coordinates, coordinates+count, geom().direction() );

00099 }
00100                 
00101 void LineDomain::closest_point( Mesh::VertexHandle ,
00102                                 const Vector3D& position,
00103                                 Vector3D& closest,
00104                                 Vector3D& normal,
00105                                 MsqError& err ) const
00106 {
00107   closest = geom().point(geom().closest( position ));
00108   normal = geom().direction();
00109   MSQ_SETERR(err)( "Cannot get normal for LineDomain", MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR );
00110 }

00117   { std::fill( dof_array, dof_array+num_handles, 1 ); }

00119 
00120 double LineDomain::arc_length( const double position1[3],
00121                                const double position2[3],
00122                                MsqError& )
00123 {
00124   double p1 = mGeom.closest( position1 );
00125   double p2 = mGeom.closest( position2 );
00126   return p2 - p1;
00127 }
00128 
00129 void LineDomain::position_from_length( const double from_here[3],
00130                                        double length,
00131                                        double result_point[3],
00132                                        MsqError& )
00133 {
00134   const double param = mGeom.closest( from_here );
00135   mGeom.point(param + length).get_coordinates( result_point );
00136 }

00138 void CircleDomain::snap_to( Mesh::VertexHandle ,
00139                             Vector3D &coordinate) const
00140   { coordinate = geom().closest( coordinate ); }
00141 
00142 void CircleDomain::vertex_normal_at( Mesh::VertexHandle ,
00143                                      Vector3D &coordinate) const
00144 {
00145     // no normal, return tangent instead.
00146   Vector3D junk, copy(coordinate);
00147   if (!geom().closest( copy, junk, coordinate )) // at center?
00148     coordinate = geom().radial_vector();
00149 }
00150   
00151 
00152 void CircleDomain::element_normal_at( Mesh::ElementHandle h,
00153                                       Vector3D &coordinate) const
00154   { CircleDomain::vertex_normal_at( h, coordinate ); }
00155   
00156 void CircleDomain::vertex_normal_at( const Mesh::VertexHandle* handles,
00157                                      Vector3D coordinates[],
00158                                      unsigned count,
00159                                      MsqError& err ) const
00160 {
00161   for (unsigned i = 0; i < count; ++i)
00162     vertex_normal_at( handles[i], coordinates[i] );
00163   MSQ_SETERR(err)( "Cannot get normal for CircleDomain", MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR );
00164 }
00165   
00166 void CircleDomain::closest_point( Mesh::VertexHandle ,
00167                                   const Vector3D& position,
00168                                   Vector3D& closest,
00169                                   Vector3D& normal,
00170                                   MsqError& err ) const
00171 {
00172     // no normal, get tangent instead
00173   if (!geom().closest(position, closest, normal)) { // at center?
00174     normal = geom().radial_vector();
00175     closest = geom().center() + normal;
00176   }
00177   MSQ_SETERR(err)( "Cannot get normal for CircleDomain", MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR );
00178 }
00179   
00180 void CircleDomain::domain_DoF( const Mesh::VertexHandle* ,
00181                                unsigned short* dof_array,
00182                                size_t num_handles,
00183                                MsqError& err ) const
00184   { std::fill( dof_array, dof_array+num_handles, 1 ); }
00185 
00186 
00187 double CircleDomain::arc_length( const double position1[3],
00188                                  const double position2[3],
00189                                  MsqError& )
00190 {
00191   Vector3D p1 = Vector3D(position1) - mGeom.center();
00192   Vector3D p2 = Vector3D(position2) - mGeom.center();
00193   Vector3D vy = mGeom.normal() * p1;
00194   Vector3D vx = vy * mGeom.normal();
00195   double x = p2 % vx;
00196   double y = p2 % vy;
00197   double angle = atan2( y, x );
00198   return angle * mGeom.radius();
00199 }
00200 
00201 void CircleDomain::position_from_length( const double from_here[3],
00202                                          double length,
00203                                          double result_point[3],
00204                                          MsqError& )
00205 {
00206   Vector3D b = Vector3D(from_here) - mGeom.center();
00207   Vector3D vy = mGeom.normal() * b;
00208   Vector3D vx = vy * mGeom.normal();
00209   double angle = length / mGeom.radius();
00210   double x = std::cos( angle );
00211   double y = std::sin( angle );
00212   vy *= y/vy.length();
00213   vx *= x/vx.length();
00214   Vector3D result = vx + vy;
00215   result *= mGeom.radius();
00216   result += mGeom.center();
00217   result.get_coordinates( result_point );
00218 }
